affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表形容词, "...的", 一般缀于名词后

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 唯物主义；唯物论；物质主义
唯物主义者；实利主义者
使具体化，使有形；使突然出现；使重物质而轻精神

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指某一种形式的物质，既可指元素也可指化合物。
多用于日常生活中，非正式用词。常指构成整体的所有部分、物体或项目。有时指劣等材料，含轻蔑意味。
通常指构成实物的物质，与精神相对立。在科学上，指占有空间，并能以某种方式被感官觉察的一切东西。
通常指组成客观存在物的部分或其原料。

word_group.brief_definition: 教学材料；教材；教学素材
建筑材料；结构材料；工程材料
复合材料；合成粅料；合成材料
基材；基础材料；基本材质
材料科学；材料科技；材料学
材料供应；物资供应；原料供应
材料处理；物资处理；材料搬运
起始材料；起始原料；起始物质

bilingual.source: Paper is uncountable when it means material.
bilingual.target: 纸在表示材料时是不可数的。

bilingual.source: Space technologies have helped the research and development of new material.
bilingual.target: 太空技术帮助了新材料的研究和开发。

bilingual.source: Our clothes are made of light cotton material so that we keep cool.
bilingual.target: 我们的衣服是由轻便的棉质材料制成的，这样我们可以保持凉爽。

bilingual.source: The new material is structurally stronger than the old one.
bilingual.target: 新材料在结构上比旧材料更强。

bilingual.source: This material has better compressive strength than others.
bilingual.target: 这种材料的抗压强度比其他材料更好。

list.abstract: material（英 [məˈtɪəriəl]，美 [məˈtɪriəl]），英语单词。作名词为材料；资料；织物等。作形容词为物质的；重要的；肉体的等。例句：Lessen their concerns about material well-being.（减少他们对物质生活的担忧。） material的近义词有crucial，important，ingredient等。反义词有immaterial，incorporeal，nsubstantial。
翁滋蔓- Material作词：翁滋蔓作曲：Lars Quang, Rene Prang,

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe I'll sign for it, tear it open. Pull out the packing material.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可能会签收，撕开他，扯开包装材料。

yingyinNormal.en: And with my breakthrough shrinking inorganic material, I thought, could it be possible to shrink a person?
yingyinNormal.zh: 随着我在非有机材料缩小技术上有所突破，我就在想，缩小人类是否可行？

yingyinNormal.en: It's near the Coliseum. The suspect was not in his apartment, but we did find bomb-making material.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯 ，那里离体育场很近。嫌疑人不在公寓里，但是我们发现了制造炸弹的材料。

yingyinNormal.en: The material is a blend of taffeta and high density body armor. Fully armed and loaded. And they glow. That's nuclear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由高档材料制作而成有高密度的盔甲防护，藏着上膛的武器，还有发着光的核武器。

yingyinNormal.en: Plain lo in the morning. Lola in slacks. Lois Lane. Come see the view. Now the secret to the height is the building material.
yingyinNormal.zh: 早上她是普通的洛，穿上宽松便裤时是洛拉，露易丝·莱恩。过来看看这风景，高度的秘诀，在于建造所用的材料。

yingyinNormal.en: Concrete is a construction material composed of sand, water and chemical admixtures. Chapter one, sand. Peppa, George and Mommy Pig have fallen asleep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 混凝土它是盖房子用的一种材料，由沙子水，还有化学添加剂组成。第一章，沙子。佩奇，乔治，还有猪妈妈都睡着了。

yingyinNormal.en: And they vow to read everything on time and prepare and read not just the material on the syllabus but in fact beyond that, and expand their horizon. It would be fantastic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们发誓要按时看完所有书籍，而且除了看课程大纲里要求的材料他们还要看一些课外书籍来开拓眼界，这听起来是个多么美好的计划。

yingyinNormal.en: Has new material arrived ahead of schedule?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有新的资料提前到了吗

yingyinNormal.en: Oh! Tell her she's not marriage material. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 就说她不是结婚的料。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: And why would we want to weaponize this material?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们为什么要把这种物质做成武器呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Your coach had you pegged as Olympic team material.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你教练曾视你为奥运队的人才。

yingyinNormal.en: Acknowledging presence of genetic material. Analyzing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正在确认基因物质。正在分析。

yingyinNormal.en: I knew all I had to do was let the material speak for itself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就知道教材充实最重要。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, it's amazing how much they can do with so little material.
yingyinNormal.zh: 料子那么少，效果却那么大。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, how do you prevent eddy currents in a transformer? Laminate the core material.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你如何预防变压器中的涡流损耗？层压芯材。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm saying you put too much importance on material objects and not enough on justice. Oh, really?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得你把这些身外之物看得太重要，反而忽略了正义。是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Stop it. H.E. Rounds, high-explosive, used only in anti-material weapons, Shreds a bulletproof vest like paper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别碰。HE子弹，高爆破性，仅用于反物资武器，防弹衣在它面前形同虚设。

yingyinNormal.en: We gotta find a way, using nothing but this, to reinforce this so the waste material avoids the spinning turbine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要想个方法，只用这些零件来加固这个，避免堵住旋转涡轮。

yingyinNormal.en: I've identified the host as general Zod of Kandor. Acknowledging presence of foreign genetic material. Analyzing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 已辨认出基因主人为坎多城的佐德将军。正在确认外来基因物质。正在分析。

yingyinNormal.en: So what's the thanks I get for turning Leonard into quality boyfriend material? I have to tiptoe around his new girlfriend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我费了那么大劲把莱纳德改造成一个超级无敌好男友，可结果我得到了什么？我在他女朋友面前还得处处谨小慎微。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 材料; 原料; 布料

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 唯物主义的；唯物论的；贪图享乐的

word_family.mean: n. 材料；原料；素材；资料；布料；织物；项目；用品；用具；曲目

sense_info_list.en: the matter from which a thing is or can be made
sense_info_list.zh: 材料; 原料; 布料

examination_example.sentence: The limitations of your painting <highlight>materials</highlight> means that what you start out trying to achieve may not come to life the way that you expected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绘画材料的局限性意味着你开始想要呈现的效果最终可能并不会像你期望的那样实现。

examination_example.sentence: Here was the raw <highlight>material</highlight> of houses and furniture, ships and potash, dyes and naval stores.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有房屋和家具的原材料，船只和钾碱，染料和松脂制品。

examination_example.sentence: Such background <highlight>material</highlight> inevitably reflects who we are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的背景材料不可避免地反映了我们是谁。

sense_info_list.en: denoting or consisting of physical objects rather than the mind or spirit

examination_example.sentence: Even better would be to help elevate notions of beauty beyond the <highlight>material</highlight> standards of a particular industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更好的办法是超越特定行业的物质标准来帮助提升美的概念。

examination_example.sentence: The fashion industry knows it has an inherent problem in focusing on <highlight>material</highlight> adornment and idealized body types.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时尚界深知专注于物质装饰和理想化的体型是其固有的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Humans are unique in their capacity to not only make tools but then turn around and use them to create superfluous <highlight>material</highlight> goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类的独特性在于，他们不仅仅有制造工具的能力，而且在制造工具之后还能使用这些工具创造的额外物品。

sense_info_list.en: facts, information, or ideas for use in creating a book or other work

examination_example.sentence: His reading <highlight>material</highlight> has changed from science fiction and reference books: he revealed that he reads at least 50 nonfiction books a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的阅读材料已经不再是科幻小说和参考书：他透露自己每年至少阅读50本非虚构类书籍。

examination_example.sentence: We ascribe meanings to texts on the basis of interaction between what we might call textual and contextual <highlight>material</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们根据我们所谓的文本和尚晓雯材料之间的相互作用，来赋予文章意义。

examination_example.sentence: A small number of people upload <highlight>material</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 少数人会上传材料。

sense_info_list.en: important and needing to be considered

exam_freq_info.chinese: 材料; 原料; 布料

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 显形；出现；实现；发生；显现；使显形；使出现；使具体化；使物质化
adv. 重大地；相当地；财富上；物质上
adj. 无关紧要的；不相关的；无形的；非物质的

word_family.mean: n. 材料；原料；素材；资料；布料；织物；项目；用品；用具；曲目

sense_info_list.zh: 材料; 原料; 布料

examination_example.sentence: Burberry is working with a partner to make full use of leather <highlight>materials</highlight> to reduce waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Burberry正在与合作伙伴合作，充分利用皮革材料来减少浪费。

examination_example.sentence: One such partnership is with Elvis & Kresse, an accessories brand working with reclaimed <highlight>materials</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一个合作伙伴是Elvis & Kresse，一个使用再生材料的配件品牌。

sense_info_list.en: things that are needed in order to do a particular activity

examination_example.sentence: Rather than getting <highlight>material</highlight> things, children need parents' devoted attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们需要的不是物质上的东西，而是父母全神贯注的关注。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表形容词, "...的", 一般缀于名词后

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指木材、石头、金属、塑料等用于制作某物的原材料; 也可指文学创作的素材。
通常指构成实物的物质, 指一切有形物质的总称。在哲学上, 与意识相对立。在科学上, 指占有空间, 并能以某种方式被感官觉察的一切东西。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 材料; 原料; 布料

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 显形；出现；实现；发生；显现；使显形；使出现；使具体化；使物质化

word_family.mean: n. 材料；原料；素材；资料；布料；织物；项目；用品；用具；曲目

sense_info_list.zh: 材料; 原料; 布料

examination_example.sentence: They must be made from a <highlight>material</highlight> that bends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们必须由能弯曲的材料制成。

examination_example.sentence: They must be made from a rare <highlight>material</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们一定是用稀有材料做的。

examination_example.sentence: It lacks the <highlight>material</highlight> he needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它缺乏他所需要的物质。

sense_info_list.en: things that are needed in order to do a particular activity

examination_example.sentence: A Pearson spokesperson told BuzzFeed News that "digital <highlight>materials</highlight> are less expensive and a good investment" that offer new features, like audio texts, personalized knowledge checks and expert videos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 皮尔森(Pearson)公司的一位发言人对 BuzzFeedNews 说：“数字教材价格较低，是一项很好的投资。”它提供了新功能，例如音频文本，个性化知识检查和专家视频。

examination_example.sentence: Its digital course <highlight>materials</highlight> save students up to 60% compared to traditional printed textbooks, the company added.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司补充说，与传统的印刷教科书相比，其数字课程材料为学生节省了高达60%的费用。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers have found that students who sign up to tutor others work harder to understand the <highlight>material</highlight>, recall it more accurately and apply it more effectively.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员发现，和其他学生相比，给别人提供辅导的学生在知识理解上会更下功夫，知识回顾更准确，知识应用更有效。

examination_example.sentence: Student teachers are motivated to help Betty master certain <highlight>materials</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些“小老师”们(即扮演教师角色的学生)十分热情地帮助贝蒂掌握某些特定的知识，动力十足。

examination_example.sentence: The agents' questions compel student tutors to think and explain the <highlight>materials</highlight> in different ways, and watching the agent solve problems allows them to see their knowledge put into action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “虚拟学生”提出的问题促使小老师们换以不同的方式思考和解释问题，而看“学生们”如何解决问题可以让他们目睹自己的知识付诸于实施。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, the slugs use the genetic <highlight>material</highlight> so well that they pass it on to their future generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，绿海姑蚧很好地利用了这种遗传物质，并将其遗传给后代。

通常指构成实物的物质，指一切有形物质的总称。在哲学上，与意识相对立。在科学上，指占有空间，并能以某种方式被感官觉察的一切东西。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 材料; 原料; 布料

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 材料; 原料; 布料

examination_example.sentence: £40 including <highlight>materials</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括材料共40英镑。

examination_example.sentence: The government has already permitted the company to use special <highlight>materials</highlight> to make it easier for the vehicle to fly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府已经允许该公司使用特殊材料，使这种工具更容易飞行。

examination_example.sentence: Beyond satisfying a <highlight>material</highlight> need, he has provided an opportunity for kids in his neighborhood to learn how to fix their own bikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了满足物质需求，他还为邻居家的孩子提供了一个学习如何修理自行车的机会。

examination_example.sentence: People don't just want <highlight>material</highlight> things anymore, they want to experience life—the arts are a perfect crossover (交迭) between culture and commerce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们不再只是想要物质上的东西，他们想要体验生活——艺术是文化和商业之间完美的交迭。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 教学材料；教材；教学素材

examination_example.sentence: Be familia with the <highlight>material</highlight> that you are going to learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 熟悉你要学的材料。

examination_example.sentence: The suitable backpack <highlight>material</highlight> that you should choose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该选择合适的背包材料。

examination_example.sentence: What can we learn about the books from the <highlight>material</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从材料中我们可以了解到这些书的什么信息？
